articles.description: Speaking to NDTV, Sania Mirza hoped her competing at the highest level after "having a baby" can be an inspiration to "some young women and young mothers out there".
articles.content: Sania Mirza will be seen in action at Wimbledon where she will be partnering Bethanie-Mattek Sands in the women's doubles draw. The Indian tennis superstar will then take part in the Tokyo Games -- h… [+1650 chars]
